name: Abyss Global
overview: Programming: Roberto Ricioppo (Using Sideways S.E.U.C.K) Graphics: Roberto Ricioppo Music: Richard Bayliss Genre: Shoot 'Em Up (S.E.U.C.K) Tape Loader: Thunderload (Richard Bayliss + Martin Piper) Year of release: 2016 Deep under the ocean lies a secret underground lair. You are a diver, who has been assigned a mission in which is to find that hidden lair and clean out the sea from mutant fish and rogue objects. In order to do this, you must shoot away at the objects. Try to avoid getting caught. If you get caught your diving suit will get destroyed. Good luck.
